###
### Super buff for Crader's EM-P5.  Cheating!
###
### Vastly buffs Crader's EM-P5's damage, makes it not consume any ammo,
### gives it perfect accuracy+handling (though the in-game Handling stat
### won't say 100%), and improves its already-good fire rate
###
### Used by myself primarily just for mod testing purposes, for when I
### don't want to be bothered by actual combat.
###
### Note that any EM-P5 with the x2 Grip will consume 1 ammo (as opposed
### to its usual 2).  This mod prevents further x2 Grips from spawning.
###
### Generated by gen_craders_emp5_super_buff.py
###

prefix: Craders

# Custom Effects
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Raid1/Re-Engagement/Weapons/CraderMP5/Parts/Part_SM_DAL_Barrel_CraderMP5.Part_SM_DAL_Barrel_CraderMP5,InventoryAttributeEffects,0,,((AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_Damage.Att_Weapon_Damage"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=6000)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_ShotAmmoCost.Att_Weapon_ShotAmmoCost"',ModifierType=OverrideBaseValue,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_FireRate.Att_Weapon_FireRate"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.5)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_Spread.Att_Weapon_Spread"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.001)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_AccuracyImpulse.Att_Weapon_AccuracyImpulse"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.001)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_SwayScale.Att_Weapon_SwayScale"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.001)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_SwayZoomScale.Att_Weapon_SwayZoomScale"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.001)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_RecoilHeightScale.Att_Weapon_RecoilHeightScale"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.001)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_RecoilWidthScale.Att_Weapon_RecoilWidthScale"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.001)))

# Disallow x2 Grip from Spawning
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/PatchDLC/Raid1/Re-Engagement/Weapons/CraderMP5/Balance/Balance_SM_DAHL_CraderMP5.Balance_SM_DAHL_CraderMP5,RuntimePartList.AllParts.AllParts[24].Weight.BaseValueConstant,0,,0
